definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian jackdaw (Coloeus monedula)
(bird species of China) Daurian jackdaw (Coloeus dauuricus)

sentences.english: I propose to make the Jackdaw king, because of the beauty of its plumage.
sentences.chinese: 我提议让唱着美丽羽毛的寒鸦当国王。

sentences.english: Jackdaws are incessantly circling round its golden crosses.
sentences.chinese: 有些寒鸦绕着教堂上的金色十字架不停地盘旋。

sentences.english: The jackdaw perches and starts anew.
sentences.chinese: 寒鸦在栖木上又叫了一次。

sentences.english: The jackdawsdo not know their enemies.
sentences.chinese: 寒鸦们不认识自己的敌人。

sentences.english: But Jackdaws Play by themselves in the end what has been done, Jackdaws Play by themselves do not know.
sentences.chinese: 可是寒鸦自己到底做了什么，寒鸦自己都不知道。

sentences.english: But Jackdaws Play by themselves in the end what has been done, Jackdaws Play by themselves do not know.
sentences.chinese: 可是寒鸦自己到底做了什么，寒鸦自己都不知道。

sentences.english: Jupiter: I propose to make the Jackdaw king,because of the beauty of its plumage.
sentences.chinese: 我提议让唱着美丽羽毛的寒鸦当国王。

definition: to go off like a rocket/to rocket
to scare a bird into flight
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
